channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 04:23 Flow alarm to Zaporizhzhia region. Since further messages.
item.description: 游릭 04:23 Flow alarm to Zaporizhzhia region. Since further messages.#Zaporizhzhia This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 04:10 Failure to Dnipropetrovsk Oblast. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Sinelnikovsky rayon- Marganets and Marganets Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigoriva Territorial Community
